LanguageData.WNA_CastDamage.label: corrosion
LanguageData.WNA_CastDamage.description: A horrible melting wound, seems never to heal.
LanguageData.WNA_Corrosion.label: whelingnorther corrosion
LanguageData.WNA_Corrosion.description:
An as yet unexplained fatal health condition in which victims often exhibit a unique state of melting upon death. Usually found on victims harmed by WNA rite weapons or directly attacked by Whelingnorthan.
So far hardly any methods can be used to treat this condition, what people can do is just pray and watch the condition grow worse, finally killing the victim.
LanguageData.WNA_Corrosion.stages.hidden.label: hidden
LanguageData.WNA_Corrosion.stages.severe.label: severe
LanguageData.WNA_Corrosion.stages.extreme.label: extreme
LanguageData.WNA_Corrosion.stages.fatal.label: fatal
LanguageData.WNA_HPDamage.label: gunshot
LanguageData.WNA_HPDamage.description: A shot wound caused by hollow point bullet.
LanguageData.WNA_KineticDamage.label: kinetic burn
LanguageData.WNA_KineticDamage.description: A burn wound caused by WNA's thought-kinetic weapons.
LanguageData.WNA_RadEffect.label: rad-field buildup
LanguageData.WNA_RadEffect.description: Hazardous effect of being exposed to radiation field. The special radiation field can convert the non-radioactive atoms that consisting normal tissue into radioactive isotopes, causing endogenous radiation that is difficult to eliminate. In extreme cases, the victim themselves will become a strong source of radiation.
LanguageData.WNA_RadEffect.comps.HediffComp_SurgeryIn: Radiation damages can be found in {PAWN_nameDef}'s body. This unusual radiation effect is turning normal tissue into radiation souces, and almost cannot naturally expire.
LanguageData.WNA_RadEffect.stages.minor.label: minor
LanguageData.WNA_RadEffect.stages.obvious.label: obvious
LanguageData.WNA_RadEffect.stages.severe.label: severe
LanguageData.WNA_ScrapBuildup.label: scrap buildup
LanguageData.WNA_ScrapBuildup.description: Multiple hazardous industrial waste accumulate in this person's body. Given that industrial waste is difficult to metabolize, this health condition will lead to long-term health risks. Can lead to lethal accute total organ failure if this condition continue to develop.
LanguageData.WNA_ScrapBuildup.comps.HediffComp_Surger: Multiple hazardous industrial waste accumulates in {PAWN_nameDef}'s body. This condition is hard to handle, long-term medical care is suggested.
LanguageData.WNA_ScrapBuildup.stages.initial-0.label: initial
LanguageData.WNA_ScrapBuildup.stages.initial-1.label: initial
LanguageData.WNA_ScrapBuildup.stages.minor.label: minor
LanguageData.WNA_ScrapBuildup.stages.moderate.label: moderate
LanguageData.WNA_ScrapBuildup.stages.serious.label: serious
LanguageData.WNA_ScrapBuildup.stages.extreme.label: extreme
